body_html:
@SsnL I got such error ,
AttributeError: 'Variable' object has no attribute 'new_zeros'

Here is my implementation based the code you provide:

class PadWithin(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self, stride=2):
        super(PadWithin, self).__init__()
        self.stride = stride
        
    def forward(self, feats):
        self.w = feats.new_zeros(self.stride, self.stride)
        return F.conv_transpose2d(feats, w.expand(feats.size(1), 1, stride, stride), stride=stride, groups=feats.size(1))
